        Method getMap

      • setMap

        public void setMap(GridMap map)
        Method setMap.
        参数:
        map - GridMap

      • validate

        public boolean validate()
        Calling this method to validate if the items on the map could form a valid path(s) When the validation falled, call getErrorMessage() to get the reason of the failure.
        返回:
        true, if the map is valid to save. false, if the map is not valid.

      • getErrorMessage

        Method getErrorMessage.
        返回:

      • generateRoadItemsFromPaths

        public void generateRoadItemsFromPaths()
        This method will geneate Road object and set them on to the GridMap based on the GridMap.getPaths()
